body: We'll guys I'm leaving in a few hours for some downtime away from Minecraft. I might be on TS and Skype, however after my downtime though I will be leaving for two weeks on Vacation. So I guess this is goodbye for now. Don't worry I will be back!

title: Time to go! (Vacation)
